price: 16. Nabiyow wacyi kol ooba waqdi qhuraanat isi arraba masgayyin, raqsat kaak tasissikeemih fayxih.
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
